revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=MikroTik |model=RouterBOARD Groove 52HPn |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=09/12/2013 |manuf_country= |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=CPE, access point |fcc_id=TV7RBGRV-A52HPN |ic_id= |pwr_v=9-30 |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=Ethernet (PoE) |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe=ns |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9342 |cpu1_cspeed=600 MHz |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand=Toshiba |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9342 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn |wi1_ant_conn=N-Male |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags=high power |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.88.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass= |oui=D4:CA:6D |oui_eth=D4:CA:6D }} [http://routerboard.com/RBGroove-52HPn Product page]
This device is an [[Ubiquiti Networks Bullet2|Bullet]]-style device.
MAC labels with 00:0C:42 and D4:CA:6D OUIs are visible in the FCC photos.
